name: Shadow Maiden Upcycled Ghost Gown Small/MED
description:
Azrael's Accomplice Designs "Shadow Maiden" Gown.

A must for any discerning goth, vampire, Victorian lady, Ghostly Princess, or steampunk time traveler.

One of our favorite things to create are these lovely couture up-cycled wedding/formal gowns.

This lovely haunted gown is made out of a upcycled 1990's wedding gown.

The gown started out as a white gown, we have upcycled and hand dyed the gown and lovely beaded trims in shades of silver/grey.

Gown featured a princess fit, full skirt with built in petticoat (could be worn over a hoop to add more fullness), V back, and a bow at center back.

Long train can be picked up with a wrist wrap hidden underneath the skirt.

Available Size:
Fits a size about a size Small or Med
Busts: 33-35
Waist: 25-27
Hips: up to 36


Would make a great Halloween costume or vampire ball gown!  READY TO SHIP.


PLEASE NOTE THESE ARE MADE FROM VINTAGE GOWNS, please do take care when wearing them. The Dye process may cause spotting or slight staining, this is part of the look.
Some of the beading/trims may be loose, we have tried our best to re-sew any loose trims, but please keep in mind these gowns are vintage and may have flaws.

NO RETURNS ON OUR UPCYCLED CREATIONS.

name: Twilight Circus Corset Black with Black/White Stripes
description:
These corsets are "one run" only, meaning once they are sold out they are gone! Produced in limited #'s. Get yours now!! 

Weird and wonderful ladies of all kinds, join the sideshow and come on in! The Twilight Circus corset is sure to delight!

This corset is made of a wearable and durable cotton twill.

It features a sweetheart neckline and a nice curvy figure flattering shape.

Trimmed with black and white stripe twill ruffles and tabs.

Corset is fully steel boned with flat and spiral steels. Lined and interlined, VERY STURDY. Front busk closure and bi-directional back lacing. Can cinch you 4-6 inches!

This GORGEOUS corset is brand new and from our off the
rack sized line of affordable STEEL BONED corsets.
Even though we have multi-produced these corsets we have given our small sewing factory strict standards to adhere to, these corsets are some of the nicest off the rack styles you will find anywhere and still come from our hand drafted patterns.

Corset is available in sizes 22-34 waist.

Please see size chart below for fit:

SIZE 22: Busts of 31-34 waists of 24-26 Hips of 32-34
SIZE 24: Busts of 34-36 Waists of 26-29 Hips of 34-36

Corset is shown with our elegant belle skirt in purple available here: http://azraelsaccomplicedesigns.bigcartel.com/product/pre-sale-purple-elegant-belle-skirt-standard-sized

name: Brazen Rose Victorian Skirt in Your Choice of Colors
description:
Azrael's Accomplice Brazen Rose Skirt  in your choice of colors: Black/Purple, Black/Bugundy, or All Black


A must for any discerning goth, vampire, Victorian lady, southern belle, princess, steampunk time traveler, or burlesque performer.

The skirt is made of yards and yards of gorgeous satin material in a rich color in a "peplum" style. Skirt has three layers.
Two doubled ruffles in a shorter length and then a long gathered under layer.
Can be made with a contrast color in the middle (shown) or in solid black.
 Skirt is gathered down and attached to a elastic waistband for easy fit.

Skirt really should be worn over a hoop skirt or petticoat to complete the look (up to 108 inch circumference). Petticoat/Hoop is not included.
BIDDING ON SKIRT ONLY. Corset/Top not included.

Available Sizes:
S-XXL
S: Waists of 24-27
M: Waists of 28-30
L: Waists of 31-33
XL: Waists of 34-36
XXL: waists of 37-42

Skirt is about 40 inches long from waist to hem.

 These skirts are taking currently about 2 business weeks to make and ship.  Please be aware business days are mon-friday and do not count weekends.

name: DEAL OF THE DAY: Madame Vivienne Underbust Corset Custom Sized
description:
DEAL OF THE DAY SALE: One special sale for 24 hours!

Normally: $225!!

This great underbust corset reflects Victorian bordello elegance and burlesque style.

It was named after Burlesque performer: Vivienne Vermuth whom we made the original for and who models it in these photos.

Corset is made of high end crushed velvet in your choice of Burgundy Red (shown) or Black.

Corset is very flattering to curvy figures! Gives a great hourglass shape.

Slightly pointed shape at the top and a pointed bottom edge, corset goes down right past mid hip. Looks great worn with skirts or lingerie. 

Corset is fully lined and interlined. Features sturdy grommets and bi-directional back lacing. Steel boned with 1/4 inch flat steels, double boned on each seam.

Corset is handmade by our small team of expert seamstresses and the pattern is hand drafted custom to your measurements by our designer.

We will contact you for your measurements upon placing a order. Please provide a valid email when ordering.

name: Black Roses Gown by Azrael Black Label
description:
Azrael: Black Label is our new line of our highest end and most exquisite couture/custom sized gowns. The very best fabrics go into each gown from this line and the most painstaking care is taken to make you a gorgeous piece worthy of the "Black Label" title. All gowns from this line, as with all of our custom items, are handmade in our studios in the USA.

A lady stands in the distance, on a crumbling balcony or across a darkened hall, there is something mysterious about her, something magical, something slightly sinister, but oh so elegant. Her gown is adorned in roses of the blackest hue, seductive and dangerous, this is the spirit of our Black Roses Gown. Medieval fantasy meets Renaissance style meets Victorian Intrigue.

Gown is made of 100% silk dupoini fabric and black rose brocade with stunning soft lace sleeves. 

Gown is 2 pieces. The bodice is steel boned and fully lined for a corset fit with a cinched waist. Bodice is adorned with black rose trim. Sleeves are puffed and elasticized and fall just off the shoulder, then have a dramatic black lace bell sleeves that go to the wrist and drape toward the floor. 

Attached to the bodice is the black rose brocade overskirt which is also adorned with black rose trim down each side. On the back of the bodice is a fully removable silk bustle with black rose accents and a black rose brocade ruffle. Bustle train is adorned with three beaded black appliques for a stunning touch of detail.  Bustles trails the floor slightly. Attaches with snaps.

The underskirt is of black silk and zips closed up the back.

Gown looks best when worn with a petticoat or hoop skirt (not included).

Color choices:
All Black (shown)
Ivory (off white)
Burgundy/Black Combo

Gown is fully custom sized to your measurements. We make and pattern this gown from the ground up to fit you exactly. We will contact you for measurements upon receiving your order.

NEED A PAYMENT PLAN? You CAN pay this gown off in payments just contact us and ask!!

This gown takes anywhere from 6-10 weeks to be made and shipped, depending on our workload, during the holidays or very busy seasons it might take a bit longer though. It is always best to check with us first if you need a piece by a certain date.

Note on our policies:
We work hard to make our customers happy, however due to the custom nature of these items we do not refund this item. We will be glad to fix any major problems should a problem arise and will work our hardest to make sure you are 100% satisfied with our products. However please be sure you are fully committed to buying a gown before you purchase a custom sized item. We are not responsible for measurements sent incorrectly, or sizes chosen wrong so please measure carefully.

Not responsible for ship time on international orders once they leave our country.

name: Salon De Paris Corset
description:
Our hand-made corsets are made by designer Tracy Robertson and her small team of sewers directly from our small studio in the USA. Hours of work go into each piece to give you a quality corset at an affordable price for handmade.

This is a steel boned victorian styled overbust corset with a front busk closer (suitable for tightlacing), it is made of your choice of purple/red taffeta or black/red taffeta.

Corset has gorgeous red venice lace trim and is lined in a extra layer of red satin for contrast.

Corset is fully steel boned, lined, and interfaced. Has a front busk closure and bi-directional back lacing in a matching color. This is a real corset, not a fashion corset.

Our Corsets are lined with heavy cotton lining and fully interlined, and are suitable for repeated wear and tight-lacing.

2-5 Inch waist reduction is possible with this style of corset.

Fully custom sized to your measurements (we will email you for needed measurements when you place your order).

Available in:
Purple/Red
or Black/Red

name: Midnight Promenade Skirt
description:
Stroll through the garden under the moonlight in this lovely Victorian walking skirt.

Skirt is made is rich satin fabric in your choice of Black and Blue (shown) or all Black.

Skirt is "walking length" on most average people (just below ankle) so the lady does not have to drag her hem along with ground on her stroll. length is approx 39 inches from waist to hem. Skirt has a lovely ruffled flounce which hangs lower in the front and higher in back almost giving the skirt a bustled appearance. Flounce is trimmed with braided trim for a touch of elegance. Flounce is over-layered on the main body of the skirt which goes from waist to ankle. Zips closed up the back.

name: Short Underbust Corset Standard Sized
description:
This is the standard sized version of our normal custom "short underbust" style. One of our most popular basic corset styles! Now in affordable standard sizing!

This corset is made of satin material. It is underbust in style, a bit shorter than our standard underbust corset, this style is meant to hit right above your mid-hip line and about 1-2 inches lower than your underbust line on average sized bodies. This corset is also perfect for petite or short waisted folks. Looks great with fluffy skirts or even with jeans. This is a great starter or everday corset, with a nice lower price point.

Corset is fully steel boned with flat steel bones (1/4 and 1/2 wide), features a steel front busk closer, and is lined and interlined. It has a back flap to keep skin from showing and Bi-directional back lacing. A good sturdy corset, suitable for tightlacing.

Corset is available in sizes 22-32. Buy corset 2-6 inches smaller than your natural measurements.

name: Madame Vivienne Underbust Corset
description:
This great underbust corset reflects Victorian bordello elegance and burlesque style.

It was named after Burlesque performer: Vivienne Vermuth whom we made the original for and who models it in these photos.

Corset is made of high end crushed velvet in your choice of Burgundy Red (shown) or Black.

Corset is very flattering to curvy figures! Gives a great hourglass shape.

Slightly pointed shape at the top and a pointed bottom edge, corset goes down right past mid hip. Looks great worn with skirts or lingerie. 

Corset is fully lined and interlined. Features sturdy grommets and bi-directional back lacing. Steel boned with 1/4 inch flat steels, double boned on each seam.

Corset is handmade by our small team of expert seamstresses and the pattern is hand drafted custom to your measurements by our designer.

We will contact you for your measurements upon placing a order. Please provide a valid email when ordering.



Photos by: A to Zed Photography

name: Curvy Elegance Longline Overbust Corset BRONZE and BLACK
description:
This corset is made of lovely dull (non-shine) satin in BLACK and ANTIQUE BRONZE. A great steampunk or Victorian look.

It features a sweetheart neckline, straight cut bottom line, and a nice long-line curvy figure flattering shape.

Trimmed with beautiful bronze venise lace trim across the bust-line for a elegant dark look and bronze satin boning casings.

This corset was cut especially to flatter curvier "hourglass" figures!! It is very generous in the bust and hips.


Best fits figures of 5'4 and over and people with B cups or larger due to it's longer length and generous bust.

Corset is fully steel boned with flat and spiral steels. Lined and interlined, VERY STURDY. Front busk closure and bi-directional back lacing. Can cinch you 4-6 inches!

This GORGEOUS corset is brand new and from our new off the
rack sized economy line of affordable STEEL BONED corsets.
We can offer these corsets to you at a GREAT price because we are producing them in a small factory. 
However we have given our factory strict standards to adhere to our size chart and patterns to still give you a GREAT fit.

Corset is available in sizes 22-34 waist or upgrade to a bespoke handmade by us custom sized corset for an extra fee, we will message you for needed measurements should you choose this option.

name: Victorian Vixen Corset
description:
This is one of the corsets from our Econo-line of affordable steel boned corsets. Factory produced but still to our patterns and standards! Still a great fit and affordable for you!

This corset is overbust in style with a deep sweetheart neckline and pointed bottom front. Long-line in style.

It is made of lovely Burgundy Blood Red satin and is trimmed in contrasting boning casings and binding in black satin. It also has contrast trim over the hips, making a lovely shaping line.

Corset is steel boned with flat and spiral steels, is interfaced, lined, and has a steel front busk closure. Laces closed up the back with heavy duty grommets and bi-directional black lacing.
Will take your waist in 2-4 inches.

We recommend this corset for people with cup sizes up to D only, as the plunging bustline will not support larger busts as well.

This corset is great for a nice long-line smooth shaping fit, with just the right amount of curvature. Not recommended for the extremely curvy figure as the cut is not as hourglass as some of our corsets.

Sizes S-XXL (22-34 waists available) or upgrade your order to bespoke handmade custom sized for an extra fee:

S=22 waist (fits natural measurements of Bust 31-34, waist 24-27, hips 31-34)
M=24 waist (fits natural measurements of Bust 33-36, waist 25-29, hips 33-36)
L=28 waist (fits natural measurements of Bust 37-40, waist 29-33, hips 37-40)
XL=30 waist (fits natural measurements of Bust 38-42, waist 32-36, hips 39-42)
XXL=34 waist (fits natural measurements of Bust 39-45, waist 35-40, hips 41-45) 
CUSTOM SIZED: $225.00 each  +15 days to make time added to the make time already stated.
(we will email you for measurements for custom corsets, this will be made by hand by us which reflects the higher price).

ALLOW 7-14 days to ship.

name: Mina Vampire Gown , Many Color/Fabric Choices
description:
This gown was inspired by the gown Mina wore in the movie Dracula.

Gown is available in your choice of  size, materials, and color, listed below. It is also available custom sized for an extra fee.

description:

This gorgeous gown is made of high quality shiny bridal satin in your choice of colors (listed below). name: Upcyled Vintage Ghost Bride Gown Each Piece one of a Kind!
description:
This is a very unique item we offer. Please read our description FULLY before ordering.

These gowns are ONE OF A KIND PIECES.

NO TWO WILL EVER BE ALIKE. We have included photos of gowns we have made in the past as examples.

The gowns are made from vintage wedding gowns from the 60s-80's. Gowns are Victorian in style.

We take the gown and hand dye it shades of ghostly grays.
We then rework or redo the trims and craft them into a ghosty gothic bride creation.

Each gown is haunting and lovely.

PLEASE BE AWARE: When you place your order you will be getting a UNIQUE piece. We can not exactly reproduce any gown in these photos.

What we will guarantee you will get is this:

A) A gown in the correct size you specify.
B) A hand-dyed creation
C) All gowns will reflect VICTORIAN stylings and be GENUINE vintage gowns (most will have high collars and sheer yokes between the collar and the bust if you DONT want this let us know and we will try and accomodate you)
D) All gowns will have some sort of trim, Lace, or ruffles to make them stand out.

Each gown is it's own work of art. It is up to us to make the final piece however you can send us suggestions if you want something specific and we will TRY to find a vintage gown that comes closest to that to work with. SLEEVE LENGTH/STYLE WILL BE DETERMINED BY US, gowns are all found at vintage dealers and estate sales so we cant be overly picky about small details, you can always have it altered later.

VINTAGE GOWNS RUN SMALL. We would love to be able to offer these in all sizes but we can only offer Xtra-SMALL, SMALL, MED, and LARGE (see size chart below) comfortably at this time. If you need something in a larger size please email us and we can start the search for a piece in your size that might work.


Please be aware that vintage gowns while wearable are delicate and need to be treated with the care any special or high end garment would be treated with. We are not responsible for you ripping or damaging your gown once it is out of our possession.

MEDIUM: Busts of 34-36, Waists of 27-28, Hips of 35-37

name: Salon De Paris Gown CUSTOM SIZED
description:
This gown is called the "Salon De Paris" Gown.
It's inspiration is our take on what a American saloon girl might have interpreted what a Parisian society lady off to a ritzy event at the salon (gallery) might wear, a bolder brighter version of the sometimes modest Victorian gown. As almost all of our gowns this gown is not a reproduction, it is modern and wearable, while still echoing the past.

The gown is made of medium weight taffeta in your choice of colors lined with a satin contrasting lining on the bustle part, matching contrasting lace trim, and contrasting satin ribbon lacing. The corset is also lined with the contrasting color. You may choose from the below colors. (Deep purple with bright red is shown)

The gown is in two parts, a steel boned victorian styled overbust corset with a front busk closer (suitable for tightlacing) and a bustle style skirt. The skirt zips up the back and the bustle piece is hand tacked to the under skirt and snaps over the zip closer, the bustle piece is turned back and sewn at the corners of the train to show the contrast for added extra drama.

We suggest that you wear a petticoat, bustle pad, or small hoop with this gown to give it support and fullness (small hoop is shown). This is NOT included in the price of the gown. You can find these at bridal stores or froms other etsy sellers.

Corset and skirt are custom sized to your measurements we will message you with needed measurements upon purchase.  Please provide us with a valid email when ordering. This is usually the same email you use for your paypal email address.

description:
This gown would be a show stopper at costume balls, halloween, weddings, or fancy dress events. Would be great for fans of 18th century, gothic, fantasy, vampire, or elegant gothic aristocrat clothing.

This gorgeous gown is made of 100% silk dupioni in your choice of colors and trimed with your choice of trims.

The gown has a steel boned corseted bodice with a beaded lace front panel (laces vary) and lovely flounced and lace trimmed sleeves, bodice laces up the back. Bodice is lined and interfaced for extra stability. Bodice is a real corset and takes the place of having to add an extra corset under the bodice as real 18th century gowns did, which makes it easier to wear with less layers.

The skirt is two layers, an overskirt and a underskirt, all sewn to one waistband, and zips closed up the back. There are over 12 yards of fabric in this amazing gown. Each gown takes massive hours of work and attention to detail is never overlooked. This is truly an exquisite piece to add to your high end clothing collection!

name: Blood Countess Gown
description:
This is exclusive and exquisite gown is one of the most elaborate time consuming custom gowns we make. The gown is inspired by The Blood Countess Elizabeth Bathory. We've fused Elizabethan and modern elements to make a gown that is wearable today but echoes times past.


This gown is made of your choice of rich high quality satin or silk dupioni (upcharge for silk).

There are over 13 yards of fabric in this gown. The gown consists of a renaissance styled corseted bodice with an attached skirt.  The bodice is fully steel boned.  Bodice is made in renaissance style which is flat fronted with uplifted cleavage. The bodice has an attached overskirt and underskirt, both of which have been hand gathered to it. The bodice is trimmed along the neckline with hand pleated trim. The most striking feature of this gown is the bodice detail. A hand beaded fire cut czech glass blood red cross adorns the front of the bodice. The same beads drape delicately across the arms, these beads are hand strung with heavy fishing line for stability. The gown laces up the back with satin ribbon, the dress has a modesty panel to cover any skin. This dress can cinch you in just as a real corset does about 2-4 inches.


The gown is best worn over a large renaissance style hoop skirt that holds it out dramatically (not included). Looks good over A-line petticoats as well for a less full look.

This gown is a unique one of a kind piece, no two gowns ever come out exactly the same, and each one takes a long time to create. Please allow 6-8 weeks for delivery.


We can make this gown in other color combos or with other beading colors, just message us!

We can also put extra details on your gown such as tucking and gathering the overskirt to look like a bustle. Please be aware that any changes incur an extra fee, email us with any added details/changing before placing your order for a price qoute.


Gowns are custom sized to your measurements, upon placing order you will be contacted by us with the list of needed measurements.

name: Curvy Girl Underbust Corset
description:
Our hand-made corsets are made by designer Tracy Robertson and her small team of sewers directly from our small studio in the USA. Hours of work go into each piece to give you a quality corset at an affordable price for handmade.

Ever tried to buy an off the rack sized corset and found that they just don't fit your curves right but you just don't have the extra cash to always buy a custom sized corset? We understand that problem, often times off the rack sized corsets are just sized too "straight" (not enough size difference between the underbust, waist, and hip measurements). That's why we decided to make an affordable off the rack style that caters more to people with hourglass or curvier figures.

Introducing the Curvy Girl Underbust.  This style offers a greater underbust/waist/hip ratio than standard off the rack sizes. We understand this style of corset might not suit every figure, it's especially for our curvier clients or those of you with more waist "squish", so please see the full size chart explained below when ordering as it is not the same as our standard corset sizing.

We offer this corset in waist sizes 20-34 in variety of materials with a option to add contrasting trim and binding for no additional price mark-up. This corset features 1/4 inch steel boning on each seam and by the grommets and busk, a flat steel busk, waist tape and bi-directional back lacing. Corsets are fully lined with heavy cotton and interlined for strength. Corsets are gently curved (almost straight) across the underbust and hips to give maximum control and none of that "overhang" and "under pooch" that pointed styles can give curvier figures. 

Finished garments feature a 11 inch front busk and are about 12 inches tall from top to bottom. This height suits people of most normal heights. If you are extremely long torso-ed or extremely petite inquire about us custom sizing this corset for you for an additional fee (just email us). If you choose the trim option trim will not only go around the binding and down each seam but will also curve over the hips with a hip gusset trim (curved hip piece with trim following the curve) which highlights your curves even more. 

We think you'll enjoy this corset as much as we do!

Pictured is Hot Pink Satin with Light Pink Satin Binding and Trim.

Corsets are meant to cinch 4-6 inches and can accommodate up to 8-12 inch waist to hip difference and a 6-8 inch waist to underbust difference (our normal off the rack sizing allows for a 4-6 inch difference from the underbust to waist and a 4-8 inch difference from the waist to hips). As so not to confuse what I mean by waist to underbust and waist to hip ratio let me give you and example. A Standard sized person might be said to have a natural measurements of underbust measurement 32, waist of 28, hip of 36. That's four inches in difference between the waist and the underbust and 8 inches between the waist and the hip. But curvier girls might have the same waist size but measurements more like this: underbust 34, waist 28, hip 40, which would make off the rack standard sizing hard to fit, but they would be ideal for our cuvry girl off the rack sizing. If you have any questions regarding if this style is right for you please contact us, we'd be happy to answer them for you.

You may choose from any size below:

description:
Our hand-made corsets are made by designer Tracy Robertson and her small team of sewers directly from our small studio in the USA. Hours of work go into each piece to give you a quality corset at an affordable price for handmade.

This gorgeous corset is made from 100 percent high quality silk velvet in your choice of colors. 

It is trimmed with black venice lace appliqus all around the top and bottom of the corset. The Venice lace is hand beaded by us with genuine Swarovski Crystals in clear and a color to match your corset. Crystals are glued on with heavy duty industrial glue (E600), they will not come off easily!

Corset features a classic Victorian hourglass shape and a plunging sweetheart neckline, corset sits straight across the hips which makes it very flattering with tight or mermaid style skirts.
